dcos_url.description: The public master IP of your DC/OS installation
dcos_url.title: DC/OS URL

dcos_acs_token.description: The token generated by authenticating to DC/OS with ACS
dcos_acs_token.title: DC/OS ACS token

prompt_login.description: Whether to prompt the user to log in when token expired; otherwise automatically initiate login
prompt_login.title: Prompt to log in

mesos_master_url.description: Mesos master URL. Must be set in format: "http://host:port"
mesos_master_url.title: Mesos Master URL

reporting.description: Whether to report usage events to Mesosphere
reporting.title: Usage Reporting

ssl_verify.title: SSL Verification
ssl_verify.description: Whether to verify SSL certs for HTTPS or path to certs. Valid values are a path to a CA_BUNDLE, True (will then use CA Certificates from certifi), or False (will then send insecure requests).

ssh_user.title: SSH user
ssh_user.description: Whether to use a different default username for node SSH access.

ssh_proxy_ip.title: SSH Proxy
ssh_proxy_ip.description: Whether to use a fixed ssh proxy host (Bastion) for node SSH access.
